mapper.insert:
insert into issue_sandbox_rolling_stock ( task_id, shop_code, mat_code, size_name, issue_date, avg_sale_qty, arrive_stock_qty, total_stock_qty) values
(#{item.taskId},#{item.shopCode},#{item.matCode},#{item.sizeName},#{item.issueDate},#{item.avgSaleQty},#{item.arriveStockQty},#{item.totalStockQty})
